short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean up the BS from your social media feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sentinel is an open source chrome plugin that allows you to apply custom filters to the posts you see on LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and soon other major social media!
